DOC.brief_summary: This study is about the evaluation of which benefits single port laparoscopic myomectomy has in the perspective of cosmetics and patient satisfaction.
DOC.brief_title: Single Port Myomectomy Versus Conventional Myomectomy
DOC.detailed_description: There were several studies about feasibility and cosmetic benefit of single port laparoscopic adnexal surgery and hysterectomy compared to conventional multiport laparoscopic surgery. Meanwhile, no study mentioned benefit of single port laparoscopic surgery in myomectomy because single port myomectomy needs more labor and operator's skill than other pelvic surgery. At this point, the investigators need to verify the effectiveness and benefit of single port laparoscopic myomectomy.
DOC.criteria: premenopausal women image confirmed myoma scheduled to have laparoscopic myomectomy number of myoma =<4 and largest size <10cm scheduled to have cooperation of other surgery clinically significant hematologic abnormality DM or malnutrition under the medication which can affect wound healing previous history of other pelvic surgery
